activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#3694
activity.text: Whenever the value of either State, District or LocalBody is changed, the other values are not reseted. Eg: If we __change the value of LocalBody__, the __form is submitted__ by taking the __previous value of ward__. That ward may not be present in the new LocalBody value. This check is not done. I have added the `resetWard` function which will reset the value of __Ward__ when __LocalBody__ is changed. Similarly, the reset function for District and LocalBody too.
